roosnest.name: RoosNest
roosnest.subtitle: Parent Portal & Student Activity
roosnest.description: RoosNest helps parents stay connected with their child’s kindergarten activities, updates, and daily progress.

yaskitchen.name: Yas Kitchen
yaskitchen.subtitle: Smart meal selection for workers & staff
yaskitchen.description: Yas Kitchen is a cross-platform mess-management application built for workers and staff across the UAE. It allows users to view daily menus, browse specials, and track their food plans through a clean and intuitive interface. The project also includes an admin side, where authorized staff can log in using OTP verification. If the entered number matches an admin record, the system automatically grants access to admin controls such as meal updates and menu management. Developed entirely with React Native and TypeScript, Yas Kitchen ensures smooth performance and consistent behaviour across iOS, Android, and Web.
